name: A Mythic's Peace
description:
Gyel is excited to enjoy the upcoming Copper Moon Festival with his family.  However, he's been plagued with headaches as of late... will he still be able to participate in the festival?  Or are these headaches the result of something more ominous than he realized?

******

This Visual Novel was made for NaNoRenO 2022!

It is a Kinetic Visual Novel that is 7,500 words long.  This is one route of a longer story I am planning to continue working on.  

I have completed this at the last possible moment, and it is not the most polished visual novel ever, but I hope you will enjoy it none-the-less.  ^^
